name: Create LionDesk contacts and Trello cards when triggered by a webhook
description: Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically create a new Trello card and validate the email output from the custom webhook using ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will look the person up with Clearbit, create a LionDesk contact, and send a Slack message. If the contact already exists it will send a Slack message.
